**Council Liaison Appointments**
--------------------------------

Liaison is defined as to perform as neither an advocate nor an opponent but rather to act as a conduit for organizations, staff, boards, commissions, committees, etc. to facilitate communication between Council and entity without prejudice. The mayor is an automatic liaison to all departments, boards & committees.

| Board / Commission / Department / Organization | Liaison | Email Address |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [Double Oak Volunteer Fire Department](https://www.dovfd.org/) | Patrick Johnson | patrick.johnson@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| [Double Oak Police Department](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/police-department) | Pat Wellen | pat.wellen@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| [Planning & Zoning Commission](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/boards-commissions) | Mike Gwartney | mike.gwartney@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| [Board of Adjustment](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/boards-commissions) | Mark Dietrich | mark.dietrich@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| [Upper Trinity Regional Water District](https://utrwd.com/) | Dave Nelson | dave.nelson@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| [Cross Timbers Water Supply Corporation](https://www.crosstimberswater.com/) | Curtis Glover (08/15/2022) | curtis.glover@doubleoak.texas.gov |
| School Districts/Denton County & Neighboring Towns | Patrick Johnson | patrick.johnson@doubleoak.texas.gov |

| Committee | Council Liaison | Staff Liaison | Members |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Development Review Committee | Patrick Johnson | Chris Laugenour | Joe Dent   Brandon Miller (07/18/2022)   Jack Smith (07/18/2022) |
| Drainage Committee | Mike Gwartney | Chris Laugenour | Chris Ernst   Brandon Miller (06/03/2024)   Brianna Supulski (06/03/2024) |
| Information Technology Committee | Mark Dietrich | Chris Laugenour | \* Staff & Elected Official Committee due to nature\* |
| Investment Committee | Patrick Johnson | Chris Laugenour | Laura Meilinger |
| Ordinance Review Committee | Pat Wellen | Chris Laugenour | Sam Rogers   Karen Smith (07/18/2022)   Brianna Supulski (06/03/2024) |
| Roads Committee | Khourschid Favero | McAdams, Town Engineer\* | Nan Bowen   Jeff Crannell   Chris Ernst   Gary Goodman   Kathy Heimerdinger   Anita Nelson   Brandon Miller (06/03/2024)   Doug Minnick   Dave Wise |

If you have an idea for a committee not listed, or an area not being addressed by any of these groups, or for details about any of the existing committees, please contact the Mayor, Town Administrator, or any Town Council member. If you'd like to volunteer for a committee, check out our
[Volunteer](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/volunteer)
page.
